body:
“Made by Bosch” stands for exceptional quality of a global player. We invest in the future by steering a consistently profitable course. With your commitment, you can also help protect the long-term success of the Bosch organization.
As market leader, the Automotive Electronics Division offers innovative electronic systems, photo voltaic inverters, control units, sensors and semiconductors. Be part of our new and innovative Bosch team in Cluj.

Your responsibilities:

•	Daily operation and maintenance for medium and low voltage systems and equipment (e.g. power cells, transformers, medium and low voltage distribution systems, general power and lighting, data wiring,  access  control wiring, fire protection etc.)
•	Planning and completion monitoring of  tasks related to preventive maintenance of electrical systems
•	 Handle electrical systems malfunctions, parameters monitoring, cause analysis  and correction measures 
•	Electrical spare parts management
•	Power supply and data connections planning and execution coordination for production machines
•	Energy monitoring and efficiency improvement measures
•	Electrical  emergency issues  and troubleshooting coordination
•	Maintenance as well development project,  electrical external work coordination

Your profile:

•	Electrical background, University bachelor degree
•	3-5 years experience in electrical systems maintenance or execution
•	Experience in medium voltage power distribution systems, operation preferable
•	3B ANRE authorization
•	Familiar with power quality parameters and energy consumption assessment
•	 Job initiative, result oriented and task responsible
•	Ability for active listening and team cooperation
•	Ability to organize and perform different tasks at the same time
•	Ability to treat customer demands quickly
•	Structured, analytic mind and organized
•	Flexible and open-minded
•	Good at both speaking and writing English
•	Good skills in MS Office

Make it happen! 
Apply now!

title: Electrical Engineer (Ref. FCM1/EE)
